snippet.title: FATHOM multiplayer game 4-28-15
snippet.description:
Anim8, Daggada, Da1Niper and StrangerDangerplaying a FFA game on the latest build.

FATHOM is a fast-paced multiplayer underwater strategic combat game that combines First-Person-Shooter (FPS) and Real-Time-Strategy (RTS) genres. Establish your base, collect and hunt for resources, construct your fleet and lead them to an action-packed tactical battle to defeat your enemies and claim the ocean in glorious victory!

FATHOM begins as a PC and Mac release, with goal for future Linux and console releases. It is a multiplayer focused game and supports up to 4-players in teamplay or free-for-all modes over local area network (LAN) or via the Internet. -- Watch live at http://www.twitch.tv/fathomthegame
